result.text:
Prediction markets like Polymarket let thousands of ordinary people bet on future events‚Äîthe unemployment rate, say, or when BitCoin will hit an all-time high. 

Polymarket‚Äôs valuation quickly shot to $9 billion, making founder Shayne Coplan the world‚Äôs youngest self-made billionaire, with an estimated 11% stake worth $1 billion. His reign was short: twenty days later, he was overtaken as the youngest by the three 22-year-old founders of AI startup Mercor. 

Read more: https://t.co/yclOPRjHE0 Photo: Guerin Blask for Forbes
